title: Rich Eisen: How to 'Light Up' Bill Belichick on Super Bowl Week
description: NFL Network's Rich Eisen joins Chuck to talk about how covering the Super Bowl has changed, how pre-game commentary can be fun, and why talking about football history is the best way to get Patriots General Manager Bill Belichick to talk.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
